Package uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1

Class Library

java.lang.Object
uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Library
public class Library extends Object
A class that models a library management system with functionality to manage collections of Books, Members and Loans.
Version:
1.0
Author:
M. Shields
See Also:
  • Book
  • Member
  • Loan

  • Constructor Details

    • Library

      public Library()
      Constructor: Instantiates Library objects Set's the ID Number counter to zero. Set's the default duration for loans to twenty one days.

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      public void addMember(Member member) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Mutator Method: Adds a member to the library's members collection
      It also sets the member's ID number using the library's getNextIDNumber method
      Parameters:
      member - - A member (Member)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If provided member is null or their email matches an existing member's email
      See Also:
      • Member

    • getMembers

      public ArrayList<Member> getMembers()
      Accessor Method: Returns the members collection
      Returns:
      members - The library's members (ArrayList)

    • getMemberByID

      Accessor Method: Returns the member with the provided ID number
      Parameters:
      idNumber - - The ID number of the member (integer)
      Returns:
      member - The member of the library with the provided ID Number (Member)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the provided ID number is not valid
      NoSuchElementException - - If the member is not found or the members collection is empty
      See Also:
      • isValidIDNumber(int)

    • displayByID

      public <T extends IDNumber & Displayable> void displayByID(ArrayList<T> collection, int idNumber) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException
      Displays the details of an object in the provided collection that has the provided ID number
      Parameters:
      collection - - A collection of any single type that implements the Displayable and IDNumber interfaces
      idNumber - - The ID Number of the object of which details should be displayed (int)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the provided collection is null or empty or the provided ID number is not valid
      NoSuchElementException - - If an object with the provided ID number is not found
      See Also:
      • Displayable
      • IDNumber

    • displayMembersByLastNameQuery

      public void displayMembersByLastNameQuery(String query) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException
      Displays the details of members whose surname contains the search query (case insensitive)
      Parameters:
      query - - The search term (String)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - - If the members collection is empty
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the query is null, empty string or whitespace
      NoSuchElementException

    • removeMemberByID

      public void removeMemberByID(int idNumber) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException, IllegalStateException
      Mutator Method: Removes the member with the provided ID number from the library
      Parameters:
      idNumber - - The ID number of the member (int)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the provided ID number is invalid
      IllegalStateException - - If the member has books that need returning
      NoSuchElementException - - If no member is found

    • addBook

      public void addBook(Book book) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
      Mutator Method: Adds a book to the library's books collection
      It also sets the member's ID number using the library's #getNextIDNumber method
      Parameters:
      book - - The book to be added (Book)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the provided book is null
      IllegalStateException - - If the book's ISBN number matches an existing book's ISBN number

    • addLoan

      public void addLoan(Member member, Book book) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalArgumentException
      Mutator Method: Adds a loan to the lib's loans collection
      Parameters:
      member - - The member borrowing the book (Member)
      book - - The book that is being borrowed (Book)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the book or member is null
      NoSuchElementException - - If member or book do not exist on loan

    • getLoan

      public Loan getLoan(Member member, Book book) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalArgumentException
      Accessor Method: Returns a loan with the provided member and book
      Parameters:
      member - - The member who borrowed the book (Member)
      book - - The book that the member borrowed (Book)
      Returns:
      loan - The loan with the provided member and book (Loan)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the member or book is null
      NoSuchElementException - - If no loan was found

    • removeLoan

      public void removeLoan(Member member, Book book) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException, IllegalStateException
      Mutator Method: Removes a loan with the provided member and book
      Parameters:
      member - - The member who borrowed the book (Member)
      book - - The book that was borrowed (Book)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If member of book is null
      NoSuchElementException - - If loan is not found
      IllegalStateException - - If the loans collection is empty

    • getExpiredLoans

      public List<Loan> getExpiredLoans(LocalDate expiryDate) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException, IllegalStateException
      Getter Method: Returns a collection of loans that have expiration dates exceeding the date provided
      Parameters:
      expiryDate - - The cutoff date (LocalDate)
      Returns:
      loans - A collection of expired loans (List)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the expiryDate is null
      IllegalStateException - - If the loans collection is empty
      NoSuchElementException - - If the no expired loans were found

      Parameters:
      expiryDate - - The date of expiration (LocalDate)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - If the expiryDate is null
      IllegalStateException - - If the loans collection is empty
